name: Pet Vet - The Little Animal Dentist Doctor Adventure Hospital Free
name_original: Pet Vet - The Little Animal Dentist Doctor Adventure Hospital Free
description:
Join Felix, Chester, William & Rex as they visit the dentist in this fun game to suit all ages!

Use a variety of tools such as the dentist drill, and tooth remover to send these pets back home with a sparkling smile!

Change tooth shape!
Change tooth colors!
Add tooth stamps!

& Much More!


Featuring both iPhone & iPad support with cute graphics and addictive gameplay, Pet Vet is a game to really bring out your dentist skills!
